headline: A Look at Coinbase (COIN) Valuation Following New Products, Regulatory Shifts, and Deribit Acquisition
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) has been front and center for investors after a flurry of news that speaks to both near-term momentum and longer-term potential. Supportive U.S. monetary policy, a wave of regulatory clarity for digital assets, and the launch of innovative products, including an onchain lending service and Bitcoin-backed offerings, have all hit the headlines. The company's acquisition of Deribit, a major player in crypto options, only adds to the intrigue and signals possible expansion...
